review: Nothing is more frustrating than being told, just plug it in, login and you're set and then having your whole night held captive by uncooperative technology. I Bought this at Best Buy and the thing is a mess. Had to call customer service just to get it to log into our account. Then it just stayed frustrating. Took forever for Netflix to download, then it kept kicking out my password even though the login and password combo worked on all out other devices.  I've been looking at a load screen for PBS kids now for about 10 minutes. Pandora won't load, it loses connection to my network about every 5 minutes and the remote is very glitchy. All-in-all, I hate it!
